projects.title: HomeLab Setup
projects.description: The very essence of any IT's professional - the HomeLab. Mine is quite young at this stage, but it has taught me many things already. Few mis-haps here and there but nothing that can't be backed up.

projects.title: Rate your Coffee!
projects.description: My first website! I've developed this after following some quick tutorials one afternoon as I wanted to improve my espresso quality. So I've designed this to gather data on it.
